bibl.title: New Fragments of the Misoumenos of Menander. (University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No. 17.)
bibl.note: Codex de la fin du IIIe ou, plus probablement, du début du IVe siècle.
Turner Eric G., New Fragments of the Misoumenos of Menander. (University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No. 17.)
London, Institute of Classical Studies, 1965, 4°, [v]-73 pp. et 9 pll.
